directions: In a blender or food processor blend the egg, the lemon juice, the mustard, the anchovies, the salt, and the white pepper and with the motor running add the oil in a stream. Thin the mayonnaise with water if desired and serve it over asparagus.
ingredients: 3 flat anchovy fillets, rinsed, drained, and patted dry
3/4 cup olive oil, vegetable oil, or a combination of both
title: Quick Anchovy Mayonnaise for Asparagus
